features.title: Everything You Need to
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to help you understand your business better

woocommerce.title: WooCommerce Integration
woocommerce.description: Securely connect your WooCommerce store using API keys. Analyze orders, customers, and products in real-time.

excel.title: Excel Sheet Analysis
excel.description: Upload your sales Excel files and map column names. Get instant insights from your existing data.

analytics.title: Order Analytics
analytics.description: Track revenue trends, order patterns, and sales performance with comprehensive order analysis.

customers.title: Customer Insights
customers.description: Understand customer behavior, lifetime value, and purchasing patterns to boost retention.

products.title: Product Performance
products.description: Identify top-selling products, inventory trends, and optimize your product catalog.

security.title: Secure & Private
security.description: Your data is encrypted and never shared. We follow industry-best security practices.

howItWorks.title: Get Started in
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple process to unlock powerful analytics for your business

step1.title: Connect Your Data Source
step1.description: Choose between WooCommerce API integration or Excel file upload. Provide your credentials or map your column names.

step2.title: Import & Process
step2.description: Our system securely imports your data and processes it in real-time. All data is encrypted and stored safely.

step3.title: Analyze & Visualize
step3.description: Explore comprehensive dashboards with order, customer, and product analytics. Filter, sort, and drill down into your data.

step4.title: Make Better Decisions
step4.description: Use actionable insights to optimize your business. Export reports and share findings with your team.

benefits.title: Why Choose
benefits.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses making smarter decisions with their data

fasterInsights.label: Faster Insights
fasterInsights.description: Get instant analytics instead of manual spreadsheet work

dataSecurity.label: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: Enterprise-grade encryption and secure API connections

analyticsReports.label: Analytics Reports
analyticsReports.description: Pre-built reports for orders, customers, and products

realtimeSync.label: Real-time Sync
realtimeSync.description: Always up-to-date data from your WooCommerce store

highlights.exportReports: Export reports to PDF or Excel

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Data?
cta.description: Start analyzing your WooCommerce or Excel data today. No credit card required for your 7-day free trial.

footer.description: Transform your WooCommerce and Excel data into actionable insights. Make smarter business decisions with powerful analytics.
